title: # 387 - Donnell Rawlings & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Donnell Rawlings to talk about Kobe, being long time friends with Dave Chappelle, The Wu-Tang Clan, and much more!

Check out his podcast "The Donnell Rawlings Show" 

This episode is brought to you by Whoop. Go to www.WHOOP.com right now. Use the code BERT at checkout for 15% off your membership today.

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon earbuds. Get 15% off your order at www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Take Five and check out www.FIVERR.com and get 10% off your first order by using my code BERTCAST at checkout.

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
